mapper.insert: insert into tbl_freeboardreply (rno, bno, reply, replyer) values (seq_freeboardreply.nextval, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer})
mapper.update: update tbl_freeboardreply set reply = #{reply}, modified_date = sysdate where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select rno, bno, reply, replyer, created_date, modified_date from tbl_freeboardreply where bno = #{bno} order by rno asc
